title: Refrigerator Evaporator Fan Motor
description: Refrigerator Evaporator Fan Motor ★★★★★ ★★★★★ 48 Reviews PartSelect Number PS11740359 Manufacturer Part Number WP2315539 This evaporator fan motor is located in the back of the freezer, and circulates air over the refrigerator coils. These coils will convert the heat into cool air, which is then circulated.
symptoms: Fridge and Freezer are too warm

installationInstructions.author: William from Middletown, NY
installationInstructions.title: Evaporator Fan failure
installationInstructions.content: The reason I repaired it myself was because the repairman that diagnosed the problem.didn't come back in two weeks. The evaporator fan sits behind a vented wall in the freezer and directs cold air into freezer and refrigerator.I removed the ice make assembly first and then the freezer wall held in place by two sheet metal nuts. Then removed wires from fan motor. Removed the fan blade from fan motor,which was press fitted on,then removed fan motor from bracket assembly(make sure and retain the two vibration rubber washers on back and front of motor. Reinstall new motor with vibration washers and press fan blade on new motor. Install in bracket assemble and reassemnble.
